snippet: Donald J. Trump’s Twitter attacks on a leader of a blue-collar union local have raised concerns about how the president-elect will behave after he takes office....
abstract: Pres-elect Donald J Trump comes under scrutiny for disparaging comments about Chuck Jones, president of United Steelworkers of America local in Indiana; critics condemn Trump's social media comments as cyberbullying and question his ability to temper such social media rants once he is in office.

byline.contributor: John Koblin contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump’s Twitter attacks on a leader of a blue-collar union local have raised concerns about how the president-elect will behave after he takes office.

headline.main: Trump as Cyberbully in Chief? Twitter Attack on Union Boss Draws Fire
headline.print_headline: Trump as Cyberbully in Chief? New Twitter Attack Draws Fire
